actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution commending the University of Miami Hurricanes football team for winning the 2001 NCAA Division I-A collegiate football national championship.

summary.text: Commends the University of Miami Hurricanes football team for winning the 2001 NCAA Division I-A collegiate football national championship. Recognizes the achievements of all the players, coaches, and support staff who were instrumental in helping the University of Miami win the 2001 collegiate football national championship and invites them to the U.S. Capitol Building and the White House to be honored.

titles.title: A resolution commending the University of Miami Hurricanes football team for winning the 2001 NCAA Division I-A collegiate football national championship.
